HERO.name: Konstantin Aksenov
HERO.title: Software
HERO.description: I develop modern web applications and digital solutions with a passion for clean code and user experience.

ABOUT.heading: About me
ABOUT.paragraph1: Hello, I'm Konstantin - a Software Developer based in Paraguay, passionate about building scalable web applications from user interface to server infrastructure.
ABOUT.paragraph2: With strong expertise in JavaScript, Angular, and Node.js, I specialize in creating both engaging frontends and robust backend systems with DevOps solutions. Working remotely with a European work mentality, I offer flexible availability and leverage the time difference to provide extended coverage for both German-speaking and English-speaking markets.

PROJECTS.title: Featured Projects
PROJECTS.description: Discover my latest works and projects
PROJECTS.lets-todo-description: A comprehensive todo application with frontend app and backend API. Features: User authentication, CRUD operations for tasks, MariaDB database, and RESTful API with Express.
PROJECTS.super-rando-description: A dynamic web application with PHP backend and Vanilla JavaScript frontend. Features: Interactive user interface, server-side logic, and modern CSS styling techniques.
PROJECTS.join-description: A Kanban board task management tool built with pure JavaScript. Features: Drag-and-drop functionality, task management, and responsive design.
PROJECTS.loco-description: An object-oriented JavaScript game. Features: Character animation, collision detection, sound effects, and canvas-based rendering.

IMPRINT.liabilityForContentText: The contents of our pages have been created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the contents' accuracy, completeness or topicality. According to statutory provisions, we are furthermore responsible for our own content on these web pages.
IMPRINT.liabilityForLinksText: Our offer includes links to external third-party websites. We have no influence on the contents of those websites, therefore we cannot guarantee for those contents. Providers or administrators of linked websites are always responsible for their own contents.
IMPRINT.copyrightText: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to copyright law. Duplication, processing, distribution, or any form of commercialization beyond the scope of the copyright law shall require the prior written consent of the author or creator.
IMPRINT.technicalInfoText: This website is built with Angular and modern web technologies. For technical inquiries, please contact us via the provided email address.
IMPRINT.name: Konstantin Aksenov

PRIVACY.lead: Your privacy is important to us
PRIVACY.overviewText: This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our portfolio website. We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data in an open and transparent manner.
PRIVACY.autoCollectedLogDataText: IP address, browser type, operating system
PRIVACY.autoCollectedUsageDataText: Pages visited, time spent, referring sites
PRIVACY.autoCollectedDeviceInfoText: Screen size, device type, browser settings
PRIVACY.usageSiteImprovementText: Analyze usage patterns to improve user experience and website performance.
PRIVACY.usageCommunicationText: Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support.
PRIVACY.usageSecurityText: Protect against fraud, abuse, and security threats.
PRIVACY.usageLegalText: Comply with applicable laws and regulations.
PRIVACY.cookiesEssentialText: Required for basic website functionality. These cannot be disabled.
PRIVACY.cookiesAnalyticsText: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website. You can opt-out.
PRIVACY.cookiesPreferenceText: Remember your settings and preferences for a better experience.
PRIVACY.dataSharingIntro: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties.
PRIVACY.dataSharingText: We may share information only in the following circumstances:
PRIVACY.dataSharingRights: To protect our rights and safety
PRIVACY.dataSharingProviders: With trusted service providers (under strict confidentiality agreements)
PRIVACY.rightsAccessText: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
PRIVACY.rightsCorrectionText: Update or correct any inaccurate personal information.
PRIVACY.rightsDeletionText: Request deletion of your personal data (subject to legal requirements).
PRIVACY.rightsPortabilityText: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format.
PRIVACY.securityIntro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes:
PRIVACY.securityAccess: Limited access to personal data on a need-to-know basis
PRIVACY.contactPrivacyText: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your personal data, please contact us:
PRIVACY.contactPrivacyMailValue:
Konstantin Aksenov
Concordia-Str
9370 Loma Plata
Paraguay
PRIVACY.policyUpdatesText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.
